-- | Tree type and show functions for lab assignment of University of Twente. Contains RoseTree and ParseTree
--   
@package twentefp-trees
@version 0.1.0.2

module FPPrac.Trees.ParseTree
data ParseTree
ParseNode :: String -> [ParseTree] -> ParseTree
showTree :: GeneralizeTree a => a -> IO ()
showTreeList :: GeneralizeTree a => [a] -> IO ()
exampleTree :: ParseTree
instance Show ParseTree
instance Eq ParseTree
instance GeneralizeTree ParseTree

module FPPrac.Trees.RedBlackTree
showRBTree :: RBTreeG -> IO ()
showRBTreeList :: [RBTreeG] -> IO ()
data RBTreeG
RBNodeG :: ColorG -> String -> [RBTreeG] -> RBTreeG
data ColorG
RedG :: ColorG
BlackG :: ColorG
GreyG :: ColorG
exampleTree :: RBTreeG
instance GeneralizeTree RBTreeG

module FPPrac.Trees.RoseTree
data RoseTree
RoseNode :: String -> [RoseTree] -> RoseTree
showTree :: GeneralizeTree a => a -> IO ()
showTreeList :: GeneralizeTree a => [a] -> IO ()
exampleTree :: RoseTree
instance Show RoseTree
instance Eq RoseTree
instance GeneralizeTree RoseTree
